description: This source file implements the functions for managing Webc Session Objects within an HTTP Simple Client, including mapping, retrieving, adding, and deleting sessions, with a focus on host/port matching and connection management.

classes.name: HTTP_SIMPLE_CLIENT_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the HTTP Simple Client that manages Webc Session Objects and related connection details.

classes.name: HTTP_WEBC_SESSION_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents a Webc Session Object managing individual web connection sessions, including matching server details, acquiring/releasing access, and connection state.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpScoMapWcso(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * host,USHORT port,ANSC_HANDLE hReqContext,BOOL bUseTls)
methods.description: Retrieves a Webc Session Object by matching host and port; if none found, adds a new session.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpScoGetWcso(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * host,USHORT port,ANSC_HANDLE hReqContext,BOOL bUseTls)
methods.description: Retrieves an existing Webc Session Object by host and port without creating new ones.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpScoAddWcso(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * host,USHORT port,ANSC_HANDLE hReqContext,BOOL bUseTls)
methods.description: Creates and adds a new Webc Session Object associated with the specified host and port.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpScoDelAllWcsos(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deletes and releases all Webc Session Objects managed by the client.
